  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4507</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Storytelling and Irish in primary school</string>
            <string language="es">Contar cuentos y el irlandés en la escuela primaria</string>
            <string language="ga">Scéalaíocht agus an Ghaeilge sa bhunscoil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Storytelling und Iren in der Primärschule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Storytelling et Irlandais à l'école primaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Storytelling e irish na escola preliminar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storytelling ed Irlandese a scuola primaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Storytelling και ιρλανδικά στο σχολείο πρωτοβάθμιας
εκπαίδευσης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Change a story from a book through storytelling.There are many ways to use these stories in the classroom and they don’t entail much work.</string>
            <string language="es">Cambia un cuento de un libro contando un cuento. Hay muchas formas de usar estos cuentos en la clase y no dan mucho trabajo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Aithrú scéal ó leabhar i bhfoirm scéalaíochta.Tá go leor slite ann chun na scéalta seo a úsáid sa seomra ranga agus níl mórán oibre ag baint leo.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
            <string language="ga">Advice Sheet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern Sie eine Geschichte von einem Buch durch 
storytelling.There sind viele Methoden, diese Geschichten im 
Klassenzimmer zu verwenden und sie don?t haben viel Arbeit zur Folge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changez une histoire d'un livre par 
storytelling.There sont beaucoup de voies d'utiliser ces histoires 
dans la salle de classe et elles don?t nécessitent beaucoup de 
travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mude uma história de um livro com 
storytelling.There são muitas maneiras usar estas histórias na sala 
de aula e don?t envolvem muito trabalho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambi una storia da un libro con 
storytelling.There sono molti modi usare queste storia nell'aula e 
don?t richiedono molto lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλάξτε μια ιστορία από ένα βιβλίο μέσω 
storytelling. Υπάρχουν πολλοί τρόποι να χρησιμοποιηθούν 
αυτές οι ιστορίες στην τάξη και don?t συνεπάγονται πολλή 
εργασία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
